text.value: General Information
Name of facility
GPS Location
Please ensure that you capture the GPS location at the facility
Name of staff member completing this survey
This should ideally be the clinic manager or someone given the authority by the clinic manager with the necessary expertise and knowledge
Position of Respondent
e.g. facility manager, staff nurse, etc
Please indicate whether the following medicines are usually stocked at this facility.
Not stocked means that this facility does not usually carry this medicine.
Please provide any additional comments below.
If not necessary then leave blank.
Are Acyclovir 200mg tablets stocked at this facility?
Are Amphotericin B 50mg vials stocked at this facility?
Are Cotromoxazole 480mg tablets stocked at this facility?
Are Efavirenz 200mg tablets stocked at this facility?
Are Fluconazole 100mg tablets stocked at this facility?
Are Lopinovir/Rotinavir 200+50 mg tablets stocked at this facility?
Are Morphine 10mg/ml 1ml ampoules stocked at this facility?
Is Paracetamol 120mg/5ml suspension stocked at this facility?
Are Rifampicin/Isonaizid 50+75 mg tablets stocked at this facility?
Are Tenofovir 600 mg tablets stocked at this facility?
Are Zinc Sulphate 20mg dispersible tablets stocked at this facility?
Select option
Don't know
Yes
No
Acyclovir 200mg tablet
Amphotericin B 50mg vial
Cotromoxazole 480mg tablets
Efavirenz 200mg tablets
Fluconazole 100mg tablets
Lopinovir/Rotinavir 200+50 mg tablets
Morphine 10mg/ml 1ml ampoules
Paracetamol 120mg/5ml suspension
Rifampicin/Isonaizid 50+75 mg tablets
Tenofovir 600 mg tablets
Zinc Sulphate 20mg dispersible tablets
Recommended pack size
Name of the cheapest product available.
Provide the product name of the cheapest product available for this medicine?
Name of cheapest product available.
Divide price of pack by the number of vials in the pack to determine price per vial. If multiple products have the cheapest price, choose one.
Name of cheapest product available.
Divide price of pack by the number of ampoules in the pack to determine price per ampoule. If multiple products have the cheapest price, choose one.
Name of cheapest product available.
Divide the price of a bottle by the size (in ml) to determine price per ml. If multiple products have the cheapest price, choose one.
Please answer the questions below with reference to the cheapest product mentioned above.
The value above is called the pack size. For the remaining questions on this page, please use this value for the pack size.
How many tablets in a pack (pack size)?
How many vials in a pack (pack size)?
How many ampoules in a pack (pack size)?
How big is the bottle (in ml)?
What is the price paid by the patient?
If the medicine is free, please enter 0.
How many tablets does the price mentioned above buy?
This might be the same as the pack size but can be different in some cases. If the medicine is free then leave this question blank.
How many vials does the price mentioned above buy?
If the medicine is free then leave this question blank.
How many ampoules does the price mentioned above buy?
If the medicine is free then leave this question blank.
How large is the bottle (in ml) for the product mentioned above?
If the medicine is free then leave this question blank.
What currency is this price in?
This should indicate the currency of the price quoted above.
Select Currency
Botswana Pula
Congolese Franc
Lesotho Loti
Malawi Kwacha
Mozambique Metical
South African Rand
Tanzanian Shilling
US Dollar
Zambian Kwacha
Euro
Pound Sterling
Please provide any additional comments about price not covered in the questions above.
Please take a photo of the pack.
Please ensure that the label is clearly visible.
Is this medicine currently in stock?
This applies only to the specified pack size.
Not Stocked
No
Yes
If the medicine is in stock, how many full packs are currently in stock?
Enter 0 if the medicine is out of stock.
If the medicine is out of stock, how long has it been unavailable?
Select period
1-3 days
4-7 days
1-2 weeks
2-3 weeks
3-4 weeks
1-2 months
2-3 months
More than 3 months
Unknown
How long will it be until the facility receives more stock of this medicine?
How many packs have been ordered for the next restock of this facility?
If this is unknown, please enter in 8888. If more stock has not yet been ordered, please enter in 9999.
How long has it been since the last time this facility received stock of this medicine?
How many packs of this medicine did you receive at your last restock?
If this is unknown, enter 8888
Please provide any additional comments about availability or restocking not covered in the questions above.
For instance, if medicine in this pack size is out of stock but different pack sizes are available, please mention this here.
